channel.title: Bill's Bicycle Adventures in France
channel.description: Bill's bicycle trip around France in the summer of 2019

item.title: Arrival in Toulouse
item.description: Made it to Toulouse! So far, thing are going well: I bought a biycle, got some theater tickets, and generally got oriented.

item.title: Maiden voyage
item.description: I got my wonderful new bicycle and took it out for a maiden voyage. Also, a quick trip to Carcassonne, a nice outing to a café-théâtre, and a wonderful meal at a restaurant called "the dirty brts."
